recipesJson.name: Avocheesecake Milkshake
recipesJson.author: Leilani
recipesJson.description:
Live Mixing Recipe created for: SaturDIY'ing with fresh03 and Friends: Ladies Takeover 2!

  

‚≠êNOTE* Oatmeal in this recipe is Oatmeal & Milk (FE) - This flavor has not yet been added to ATF‚≠ê

  

üè∑Ô∏è An Avocado, Banana, & Cheesecake Milkshake recipe with bits of Oatmeal.  

At the front is a mild and authentic creamy Avocado and semi-ripe natural Banana. At the base; a creamy milkshake utilizing LB's Vanilla Ice Cream and FA's Premium custard. The milkshake base is complimented with FE's Oatmeal & Milk along with INW's fatty and rich Yes, We Cheesecake; providing a nice thick finish.

‚ûßTested Live same day, it is a balanced mix with mild avocado notes with stronger banana notes. I would like to see how this steeps out after 1 - 2 weeks. The addition of FW Sweetener @ 0.25% is optional.
